hr.fer.oop.lab3

Class Coach

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.oop.lab3.Person
      • hr.fer.oop.lab3.Coach
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Manager

    public class Coach
extends Person
implements Manager
    This class represents football coaches, with their name, country and emotion level inherited from the Person class, with the addition of coaching skill and it's favorite formation.
    Author:
    karlo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void forceMyFormation()
      A manager uses his formation to set team's formation.
      int getCoachingSkill()
      Returns the Coaches coaching skill
      Formation getFormation()
      Returns the Coaches formation
      ManageableTeam getManagingTeam()
      Returns the team under this coaches management.
      void pickStartingEleven()
      A method used to pick the starting eleven from a team he manages (NOTE: only the players from registered players collection are eligible); a method must be careful to pick such players who can form a team formation (e.g., a number of forwards within first eleven should match a number of forwards in a team formation).
      void setCoachingSkill(int coachingSkill)
      Sets the Coaches coaching skill
      void setFormation(Formation formation)
      Sets the given formation to be the Coaches formation
      void setManagingTeam(ManageableTeam team)
      With this method, a manager sets a team he manages if a team is not null.

      • Coach

      • Coach

        public Coach(java.lang.String name,
             java.lang.String country,
             int emotion,
             int coachingSkill,
             Formation formation)
        Constructs a new object of type Coach. All variables in this type must be initialized when calling a constructor. Variables name, country and emotions are unchangeable after calling this constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the Person
        country - country in which the Person lives
        emotion - Person's emotion level
        coachingSkill - Coaches' coaching skill
        formation - Coaches' favorite formation

      • pickStartingEleven

        public void pickStartingEleven()
        Description copied from interface: Manager
        A method used to pick the starting eleven from a team he manages (NOTE: only the players from registered players collection are eligible); a method must be careful to pick such players who can form a team formation (e.g., a number of forwards within first eleven should match a number of forwards in a team formation).
        Specified by:
        pickStartingEleven in interface Manager

      • forceMyFormation

        public void forceMyFormation()
        Description copied from interface: Manager
        A manager uses his formation to set team's formation.
        Specified by:
        forceMyFormation in interface Manager
